org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos

Class StreamWithStorageProviderFactory<ProducerType extends IDataProducerModule<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StorageDataProviderFactory
      • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StreamWithStorageProviderFactory<ProducerType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ProducerType - Type of producer handled by this provider
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataProviderFactory, ISOSDataProviderFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SensorWithStorageProviderFactory, StreamProcessWithStorageProviderFactory

    public class StreamWithStorageProviderFactory<ProducerType extends IDataProducerModule<?>>
extends StorageDataProviderFactory

    Factory for streaming data providers with storage.
    Most of the logic is inherited from StorageDataProviderFactory.

    Since:
    Feb 28, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin
